alert.note: Alert for Clark; Comanche (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 03 at 8:59PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN KIOWA...WESTERN COMANCHE AND EASTERN CLARK COUNTIES THROUGH 945 PM CDT... At 859 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Bucklin to near Englewood. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ashland and Sitka around 905 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Protection, Coldwater and Lake Coldwater. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central and southwestern Kansas.
